title: Chair Abs Workout Seated Core Exercises for Seniors & Beginners
description:
SeniorShape Fitness
7.78K subscribers
SUBSCRIBE
15 minute seated ab workout  is great for seniors and beginners!
These exercises are perfect for those who do not want to get down on the floor to work your core and abdominals.  I will instruct you through lots of different moves working all sections of your abs. We will stay in a seated position the entire time, but beware, it's not as easy as it looks!
Make sure you have a sturdy chair for this workout. Preferably without side arms so you have a full range of movement. Please don't use your couch for chair core workout.
I will instruct you to engage your core and pull your belly button in towards your spine repeatedly. This is to make sure we are activating the correct abdominal muscles and to protect the lower back as well.
Please go at your own pace and take breaks when you need to. Some of these moves are challenging. Make sure to breathe!
Core strength is so important for overall health and well being. It affects balance, posture, spine and back health and mobility. 
Great job in taking care your health and fitness and thanks for working out with me!
Products and I use and recommend can be found here:
https://www.amazon.com/shop/seniorsha...

title: Knee Strengthening Exercises | Exercise for Older Adults
description:
Sikana English
364K subscribers
SUBSCRIBE
Learn a simple lunging exercise to help you strengthen your knees

Did you know that this video knee strengthening exercise video for older adults is just one of several in a whole free program? Find them all on our website:

Access the full program on gentle exercise for older adults: https://www.sikana.tv/en/sport/50-gym...

Knee joints can weaken in old age. This simple lunging exercise with a chair can help keep them strong and therefore can help you avoid knee pain

These videos were developed in partnership with the SIEL Bleu Association

Visit our website: https://www.sikana.tv/en to discover dozens of free, online video programs on a whole range of essential topics: Health, Food, DIY, Micro-Entrepreneurship, Sport, Living Together and many more…

title: Senior and beginner Workout 10 minute ARMS & SHOULDERS with light Weights
description:
SeniorShape Fitness
7.79K subscribers
SUBSCRIBE
This video includes effective exercises for the arms, shoulders and upper back. Work your biceps, deltoids, triceps and forearms. It can be done on its own or part of the mix & match series.

Use light hand weights/dumbbells. I use 3 pounds here, and would recommend anywhere from 1-5 pounds.

Make sure to complete the workout in its entirety. The final exercises for the wrists are crucial and perfect for those with arthritis or osteoporosis!

All of these moves can also be done in a seated position. Whether done seated in a chair or standing make sure to maintain good posture and keep your core engaged (belly button pulled towards the spine).

Products and I use and recommend can be found here:
https://www.amazon.com/shop/seniorsha...
as an Amazon associate/influencer I earn from qualifying purchases
